data.name: Bionic Tadpole Demo
data.detailed_description:
Busted free from The Lab's control, he's on the run... Bionic Tadpole!
Every bullet has Bionic Tadpole's name on it as he escapes R-Man City in the stolen bionic suit!

Run-n-gun, pick up weapons, use your force shields and jetpack abilities...and always remember to never let your gun overheat. Elements of fun platforming, bullet-hell and twin stick-controlled action, with original music by MaximusCXI, created for each Stage.

Enemy Projectiles



‚Ä¢You can even shoot down enemy projectiles! üò≥Their bullets act as shields, so it makes since to pierce through the bullets in order to shoot down the enemies. Increases difficulty and challenge.üòÅ

Jetpack Ability



‚Ä¢Bionic Tadpole's Jetpack ability allows him to fly, while evading enemy projectiles of all sorts and still being able to shoot. Twin stick controls make the challenge quite fun and intense at the same time.

Shields



‚Ä¢Bionic Tadpole's shields have a bounce mechanic similar to a beach ballü§£! Makes for jumping on spikes safe and fun at the same time. üòÅ

data.short_description: A run-n-gun, non-stop action platformer-shooter! Pick up a weapon. A jetpack. A force shield. All while evading bullet-hell madness! Oh, and be mindful not to let your gun overheat...
data.reviews:
‚ÄúBionic Tadpole combines several genres into one big, madness-inducing challenge!‚Äù
Beta Tested, Game Reviewed

‚ÄúBT is a throwback to retro 2d platformer/shooters!‚Äù
The Paladin Club

‚ÄúThe controls are very smooth, and the mechanics work very well.‚Äù
ChaoticFear Indies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Controller or Keyboard and Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Controller or Keyboard and Mouse
